1.E: You prefer to direct your energy to deal with people, things, situations.
1.I: You prefer to direct your energy to study ideas, information, explanations or beliefs.

2.S: You prefer to deal with facts, proven procedures, what you know, a realist here & now.
2.N: You prefer to deal with ideas, look into the unknown, to generate new possibilities or to unticipate what isn/`t obvious.

3.T: You prefer to decide on the basis of logic, using an analytic and impersonal approach.
3.F: You prefer to decide using values, or beliefs, using a subjective, people oriented approach.

4.J: You prefer your life to be planned in a stable and organised way
4.P: You prefer to go with the flow, have flexibility & respond to events
